description: The 'create_clock_number_line' function generates a number line visualization in the form of a clock, with hours, 15-minute intervals, and 5-minute intervals marked. This visualization aids in teaching time concepts and arithmetic, particularly in understanding the passage of time and calculating time intervals.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: Clock Number Line
stimulus_type_specification.description: The 'create_clock_number_line' function creates a visual representation of a clock in the form of a number line. It accepts inputs based on the 'NumberLineClockStimulus' class, which includes the range of time to be displayed and the specific points to be marked. The function handles situations where the time range crosses 12 o'clock and adds a 15-minute buffer on each side of the range. The visualization is designed to aid in teaching and understanding time concepts, especially in calculating time intervals and understanding the passage of time.

details: The 'NumberLineClockStimulus' class, which includes the range of time and the specific points to be marked.
The 'range' input controls the span of time displayed on the number line.
The 'points' input determines the specific points to be marked on the number line.
The 'range' input must be within the limits of a 12-hour clock.
The 'points' input must be valid time points within the specified range.
The function handles situations where the time range crosses 12 o'clock.
The function draws a number line representing a clock, with hours, 15-minute intervals, and 5-minute intervals marked.
The function can handle different ranges of time and specific points to be marked.
The inputs affect the range of time displayed and the specific points marked on the number line.
